name: librarian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who works in a library, is trained in the organization or running of libraries, or is in charge of a library: The young librarian is great at finding titles children will like. The Central Library saves money by hiring clerks paid by the hour rather than trained librarians.
someone who is in charge of a collection of a particular type of books or papers, or books or papers on a particular subject: As an astronomy librarian, she is a member of a collaborative group of specialized librarians. Librarians spend days sorting through music that may be added to their collections.
More examplesFewer examplesThe librarian found articles on theology and philosophy.At that time she was working as a school librarian.Teachers and librarians at the schools develop lesson plans around the books.Many Arizona school districts are shedding librarians and cutting their hours.
